scope.title: Recruitment shortlisting with the NHS England London Talent team
scope.summary: This project looked at the issue of bias in using AI to help compare and review job descriptions and applications. It will test how algorithms perform while placing careful scrutiny on the issues of ethics, equality and inclusiveness.
